# Shadcn Registry Kit

> A template for building and publishing custom shadcn registry components.

## What is this?

This is a ready-to-use template repository for creating your own shadcn component registry. It includes documentation, a landing page, and everything needed to publish components that can be installed via `npx shadcn add`.

## How it works

1. Fork this template
2. Edit your component at `registry/new-york/your-component.tsx`
3. Update `registry.json` with your component details
4. Run `pnpm registry:build`
5. Deploy and share

## Installation

Users can install components from registries built with this template:

```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://your-site.com/r/your-component.json
```

## Links

- Documentation: https://shadcn-registry-kit.vercel.app/docs
- GitHub: https://github.com/mehmetpekcan/shadcn-registry-kit
- shadcn docs: https://ui.shadcn.com/docs/registry

## Tech Stack

- Next.js
- React
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Fumadocs (documentation)
- shadcn/ui
